DPRK Taekwon-do Team Leaves for S. Korea
   Pyongyang, April 6 (KCNA) -- An exhibition team of the DPRK Taekwon-Do Committee led by Chairman Hwang Pong Yong left here Friday to attend the Taekwon-Do demonstration to be held in the south side's area.
